ygData.msgSnippet: Tarantopulous nodded. Stranato standing next to him. They went near the CR Chambers. Stranato: Hey, give me my girl back! Tarantopulous: Your girl? Stranato:

Tarantopulous nodded. Stranato standing next to him. They went near the CR
Chambers.

Stranato: Hey, give me my girl back!

Tarantopulous: Your girl?

Stranato: My lady! I'm her man! A ladies man!

Tarantopulous heard the arise Optimus Prime thing. The voice and light woke
Inzola up. Tarantopulous sat her down.

Inzola: Taran?

Tarantopulous: Yes.

Inzola: I'm happy to see you made it here!

Stranato: Hey! Who's this guy?

Inzola: Stranato, meet my son, Tarantopulous.

Stranato: Your son? Who's his father? It had better freaking not be that
madman I rescued you from!

Inzola: yes, it is.

Stranato: Oh, no, Inzola, how could you do this to me?

Inzola: How could you do THAT to me? You used me as a shield!

Stranato: No I didn't.

Inzola: Yes you did!

Stranato: Uhh...no I didn't.

Inzola: Stranato, you know what? I don't want to see you anymore.

Stranato: No! It figures, your brat kid comes back and now you suddenly
don't want to see me? That's not fair!

Inzola: Leave me alone. Come on, Taran.

Tarantopulous: No, you need to get in a CR Chamber.

Inzola: Okay, I understand that.

Inzola gets in a CR Chamber. Tarantopulous keeps his eye on Stranato.

Stranato: Not fair!

Klant comes in.

Klant: I don't really need a CR Chamber. It's okay.

Klant leans in the corner...

----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, January 27, 2001 11:03 PM
Subject: Re: Arise.....(All NEED to read this, it affects everybody)


> ::Prowl/Firearm/Kluster/Grimmler::
>
> Prowl's head jerks up, hearing the words "Arise, Optimus Prime." He
> blinked at the light.
>
> One it has passed, Prowl looks over at Epyon. "Did you hear that too?"
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Kluster's eyes widen as he hears the same words as Prowl heard. He
> shakes his head. It must be all the damage he had taken in the battle.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Firearm spins around as the voice sounds in his ears. He turns around
> again, looking at Kluster and knowing that the other bot had heard it
> to.
>
> Kluster looks over at Tarantopulous. "No, the lockdown isn't in
> effect anymore."
>
> The two bots reach the CR chambers, Firearm putting Chordate in one
> and Kluster setting Proto down on a table. Neither of them said
> anything about the voice. Kluster looks over at Tarantopulous.
>
> "You should get some repairs. We all need them."
>
> With that, he enters a CR, the practically undamaged Firearm setting
> off for the bridge.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Grimmler frowns as he hears the voice, his optics adjusting to the
> momentary increase in light. He looks over at Necromancer. "Did you
> hear that?"
